entity.name: class_of_connection_of_product
entity.description: A class_of_connection_of_product is a type of product_definition_formation_relationship and class that is a Class_of_connection_of_product (as defined in the ARM).

explicit.name: relating_product_definition_formation
explicit.description: an instance of class_of_product that has members connected on side 2 of the connection.

explicit.name: related_product_definition_formation
explicit.description: an instance of class_of_product that has members connected on side 1 of the connection.
